title: Add web app logging interface auto-refresh toggle.
description:
https://github.com/apache/lucene-solr/pull/298

Our team wanted to be able to pause the logs, to have a bit more time to go over stack traces, so I added a toggle button.

comments.content: Patch attached as an update to the PR which didn't apply cleanly after SOLR-8090 and possibly other changes. The patch adds CHANGES.txt entry also. Tommy Marshment-Howell, please review to be sure I kept the spirit of the changes and let me know if you want your attribution in CHANGES.txt to use another name.

comments.content: I can definitely close it, but since it didn't get merged on github is there a way to do it so I am still tagged as a contributor to the project?
comments.author: Tommy Marshment-Howell

comments.content: The Lucene/Solr project works a little bit differently. One thing to note is the Github repo is actually a mirror of the real Git repo hosted by the ASF, so no PR in Github will ever be directly merged via Github. For attribution, we make sure to explicitly mention contributors in Solr's (or Lucene's) CHANGES.txt (which I did). If you want to link to the commits I posted earlier when you close the PR that would be fine and lead anyone looking at the PR in the right direction.
comments.author: Cassandra Targett

comments.content: Good to know, thanks.  I look forward to contributing more in the future.
comments.author: Tommy Marshment-Howell
